pullRequest.title: fix(escapeXML): Added missing escapeXML ,to prevent js script execution and rendering break due to single or double qoutes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added missing escapeXML ,to prevent js script execution and rendering break due to single or double qoutes
* Added missing escapeXml to merge-split Component, merge releases, license details view, list-details-edit view of project, component and release.

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (#907, #883)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change? - No


Issue:
How To Test?

Add values listed below for different fields in Project, Component, Release, Vendor, License.
'
"
<script>alert('Testing script execution!')</script>,
" + function() { alert('Testing script execution!'); }() + " 
Navigate to List view , Details view, Edit View of Project , Component, Release, Licenses , merge-split Component, merge Releases and perform operation like create-update-merge-split . Also try adding Linked Release or Project with special characters.
Expected behavior: Page should render properly and no script should be executed like alert box.


Have you implemented any additional tests? - No

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com

nodes.bodyText: May be method reference can be used here StringEscapeUtils::escapeXml
